import React from 'react'

export default function App() {
  const [count, setCount] = React.useState(0)
  const [name, setName] = React.useState('åˆ€åˆ€')
  function countChange() {
    setCount(count => count + 1)
  }
  function nameChange() {
    setName('å°åˆ€')
  }

  React.useEffect(() => {
    console.log('@');
  }, [name])


  return (
    <>
      <div>{count}, {name}</div>
      <button onClick={countChange}>æ•°é‡</button>
      <button onClick={nameChange}>åå­—</button>
    </>
  )
}

jsx
import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'

export default function App() {
  const [count, setCount] = React.useState(0)
  const [name, setName] = React.useState('åˆ€åˆ€')

  React.useEffect(() => {
    let timer = setInterval(() => {
      setCount(count => count + 1)
    }, 1000);

    return () => {
      clearInterval(timer)
    }
  }, [])

  function unmountedBtn() {
    ReactDOM.unmountComponentAtNode(document.getElementById('root'))
  }

  return (
    <>
      <div>{count}</div>
      <button onClick={unmountedBtn}>å¸è½½</button>
    </>
  )
}

jsx
const MyContext = React.createContext()
const { Provider } = MyContext

export default class A extends Component {
  state = {username: 'A', age: 23}
  
  render() {
    const {username, age} = this.state
    return (
      <>
        <div>A</div>
        <Provider value={{username, age}}> // å¤–é¢çš„ {} æ˜¯åˆ†éš”ç¬¦ï¼Œé‡Œé¢çš„ {} æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡
          <B />
        </Provider>
      </>
    )
  }
}

class B extends Component {
  static contextType = MyContext // å¯ä»¥è¿™ä¹ˆä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä½†æ²¡å¿…è¦ã€‚çˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨propså³å¯ã€‚æœ€ç®€å•æ–¹ä¾¿
  
  render() {
    return (
      <>
        <div>B</div>
        <div>ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š{this.context.age}</div>
        <C />
      </>
    )
  }
}

class C extends Component {
  static contextType = MyContext // å¿…é¡»å£°æ˜æ¥æ”¶æ‰å¯ä½¿ç”¨
  
  render() {
    const {username} = this.context
    return (
      <>
        <div>C</div>
        <div>ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š{username}</div>
      </>
    )
  }
}

å¦‚æœæ˜¯å‡½æ•°å¼ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ™æ— æ³•é€šè¿‡ this æ¥è·å– context ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³• Consumer ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

  // ...
}

class B extends Component {
  // ...
}

function C() {
  return (
    <>
      <div>C</div>
      <Consumer>
        {
          value => `${value.age}-${value.username}`
        }
      </Consumer>
    </>
  )
}

PureComponent #

  1. åªè¦æ‰§è¡Œ setState() ï¼Œå³ä½¿ä¸æ”¹å˜çŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®ï¼Œç»„ä»¶ä¹Ÿä¼šé‡æ–° render() æ•ˆç‡ä½

ä½¿ç”¨ #

  • åŠæ³•1:

    é‡å†™ shouldComponentUpdate() æ–¹æ³•

    æ¯”è¾ƒæ–°æ—§ state æˆ– props æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å˜åŒ–æ‰è¿”å› true ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å› false

    jsx
      // çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶
  shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {
    if(this.state.name === nextState.name) {
      return false
    } else {
      return true
    }
  }
  
  // å­ç»„ä»¶
   shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {
    if(this.props.name === nextProps.name) {
      return false
    } else {
      return true
    }
    // ç®€å†™å½¢å¼ï¼š
    // return !(this.props.name !== nextProps.name)
  }

  • åŠæ³•2:

    ä½¿ç”¨ PureComponent ï¼ŒPureComponent é‡å†™äº† shouldComponentUpdate() ï¼Œåªæœ‰ state æˆ– props æ•°æ®æœ‰å˜åŒ–æ‰è¿”å› true

renderProps #

children props #

react ä¸­ï¼Œç»„ä»¶å†…çš„å€¼æ˜¯ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹æ®Šå±æ€§ä¼ ç»™å­ç»„ä»¶ã€‚å­ç»„ä»¶é€šè¿‡ this.props.children è·å–ã€‚ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

jsx
export defalut class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <A>
        <B />
      </A>
      <C>xxxx</C>
    )
  }
}

class A extends Component {
  state = {name: 'A'}
  
  render() {
    return (
      <div>A</div>
      <div>{this.props.children}</div>
    )
  }
}

class B extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <div>B</div>
      <div>{this.props.children}</div>
    )
  }
}

class C extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <div>C</div>
      <div>{this.props.children}</div>
    )
  }
}

ç»„ä»¶ä¸­é—´çš„å€¼å¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è¿™ç§å†™æ³•å­ç»„ä»¶æ— æ³•è·å–çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å†…çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚å¦‚ä¸Šæ–¹ä»£ç  B ç»„ä»¶æ— æ³•æ‹¿åˆ° A ç»„ä»¶å†… state çš„æ•°æ®

render props #

jsx
export defalut class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <A render={(name) => <B name={name}></B>} />
    )
  }
}

class A extends Component {
  state = {name: 'A'}
  
  render() {
    return (
      <div>A</div>
       {this.props.render(name)}
    )
  }
}

class B extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <div>B</div>
      <div>{this.props.name}</div>
    )
  }
}
